New Records: Bam Adebayo scored 32 points on 24 shots, a season high
Key Match Events: Bam Adebayo dominated Alex Sarr, contributing to a 17-point first-half lead
Washington Wizards struggled with three-point shooting and defensive issues
Pre-Game Insights: The Wizards had a starting lineup with three rookies and one sophomore
Erik Spoelstra focused on giving Bam Adebayo more offensive touches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Mexico City
